data.enText: an amount of the profits that a company pays to people who own shares in the company
dividend payments of 50 cents a share
a money prize that is given to winners in the football pools
to produce great advantages or profits
Exercising regularly will pay dividends in the end.
data.chText: 经常运动最终会对身体大有好处的。

data.enText: to produce great advantages or profits
Exercising regularly will pay dividends in the end.
data.chText: 经常运动最终会对身体大有好处的。

tr: something extra (especially a share of a surplus)
that part of the earnings of a corporation that is distributed to its shareholders
a number to be divided by another number

example.ex: The first quarter dividend has been increased by nearly 4 per cent.
example.tran: 第一季度的股息增长了近 4%。

value.def: A dividend is the part of a company's profits which is paid to people who have shares in the company.

example.ex: Steps taken now to maximise your health will pay dividends later on.
example.tran: 现在采取措施增强体质会使你日后受益。

value.def: If something pays dividends, it brings advantages at a later date.

trans: 和平红利，和平增益(指国家因裁军而得以用于其他方面的原军备和国防费用)
